data.answer: Heavy atom induced intersystem crossing and nonradiative decay

data.question: Is the luminescence of Th-SINAP-200 ligand-based?

data.answer: Departure of two formate anions and one DMF molecule, and incorporation of a water molecule

data.answer: It predisposes the TOF to crystallize into large and high-quality single crystals suitable for elucidating its own structure and any transformed phases

data.question: Is Th-SINAP-200 a cationic thorium-organic framework?

data.answer: It is crucial for the framework's structure and its ability to undergo single-crystal-to-single-crystal transformations
